name: Export Google My Business reviews to Google Sheets
description: Every time a new review is added to your Google My Business location, Make will automatically store it in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yxB_P2opiY5oS5kK_gqQzIlBR_eBQgJ78jI9ESChT3w/edit?usp=sharing).
